messages.title: BACK ME TO LEAD BRITAIN'S BREXIT NEGOTIATIONS
messages.content: Just 11 days after you vote in this unique and crucial election, the European Union wants to start Brexit negotiations with Britain. Your local vote in North Norfolk will decide who will be the Prime Minister to lead these Brexit negotiations on behalf of our country.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The candidate is urging voters to back them to lead Brexit negotiations with the European Union, starting 11 days after the election.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Your local vote in North Norfolk will decide who will be the Prime Minister to lead these Brexit negotiations on behalf of our country.

issues.brexitEurope: The candidate highlights the importance of Brexit negotiations with the European Union and the decision of who will lead those negotiations for Britain.

images.caption: EU wants Brexit negotiations to start 11 days after you vote

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet prompts voters to make a plan to vote on the election date and emphasizes the role of Brexit negotiations in the upcoming election.
